# A _curated_ collection of Apps generated by Nativefier

Check the Makefile for more info. Feel free to create PRs :)

Apps supported:

1. [YouTube][def] - Maintains single Window / Tab, & supports Sign-in

```shell
$ make youtube
App built to /Users/vik/Applications/YouTube Native-darwin-arm64, move to wherever it makes sense for you and run the app bundle.
```

[def]: https://youtube.com
